author: Special Correspondent
text:
The members of the Southern Railway Engineers Association (SREA) held a dharna in front of the Salem Railway Division here on Wednesday demanding that the railways remove all the anomalies concerning the wage structure of the railway engineers in the Seventh Pay Commission and to press for a charter of demands.

They said that the anomalies in the pay structure of engineers are continuing from the Fourth Pay Commission onwards. Even in the Seventh Pay Commission has fixed lower scale of pay.

The Commission did not concede to any of the suggestions put forth by the association during the various sittings. They wanted Group D status to railway engineers on a par with the Union Government engineers as stated in the Department of Personnel and Training circular of 2009.
title: Dharna held
